Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

NewsBreak - Global - Teniva Blood Balance - 14.Aug

My ads are rejected and I believe thats a false flag. Can someone explain if there is actually some problem with the policy? I am not using any name or image of celebrity or anything like that. atleast I dont see that

I'm sorry to hear that your ads were rejected. Ad rejection reasons can vary, and it's important to review the specific reason provided by Ad Support. You should have received an email with the subject line ‘Urgent: Ad Rejected - Action Required,’ which will detail the reason for rejection. 

If you believe your ad complies with our policies or if the rejection was a misunderstanding, you can submit an appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com. Make sure to address any specific issues mentioned in the rejection email before resubmitting your ad.

For more information on our ad policies, you can check out our [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy) document.
